name: Adoration of the Shepherds
description: Adoration of the Shepherds; Baciccio (Giovanni Battista Gaulli) (Italian, 1639 - 1709); about 1672; Pen and brown ink, brown wash, white gouache heightening and black chalk; 27.1 x 21.3 cm (10 11/16 x 8 3/8 in.); 87.GG.19; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Adoration of the Shepherds
medium: Pen and brown ink, brown wash, white gouache heightening and black chalk
